title: Definitions
context: ยง379-1 Definitions. The term &ldquo;labor disputes&rdquo; includes any controversy concerning terms, tenure, or conditions of employment, or concerning the association or representation of persons in negotiating, fixing, maintaining, changing, or seeking to arrange terms or conditions of employment, regardless of whether the disputants stand in the proximate relation of employer and employee. [L 1967, c 18, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง379-1]
